name: Rat Kingdom
description:
Created for GMTK 2021 - "Joined Together" theme

The rats have been driven away from their kingdom and must return! And what better way to come back, than to come back a Rat King?

Featuring permadeath, every rat in the king has a little snippet of backstory!

Controls:

Click or tap a rat to make it start to pull the king around the level
